name: biryani
ingredients: rice, oil, eggs, onion, chicken, nutmeg, mace, cloves, cardamom, tomatoes, cinnamon, tomatoes
description: If you are a fan of keema, then you would surely like this biryani recipe. Made with basmati rice, minced mutton, yoghurt and a melange of whole spices, this biryani recipe is to die for!

name: kabuli Pulao
ingredients: cloves garlic, raisins, almonds, cumin, yoghurt, green cardamom, cashews, refined oil, coriander powder, tomatoes, cinnamon, tomatoes
description: Kabuli Pulao is an Pakistani delicacy which is made of mutton and rice. The Pulao is rich in flavour due to the dry fruits that are added on top. The mutton stock added while cooking the rice also enhances its taste.

name: vegetable Pulao
ingredients: Basmati rice, minced, cumin seeds, cardamom pods, cinnamon stick, bay leaf, chopped fresh coriander leaves, coriander powder, cumin powder
description: Vegetable Pulao is a common dish served during festive occasions and celebrations in Pakistan. It's a staple at weddings, Eid celebrations, and other important events. Its vibrant appearance and delicious taste make it a favorite for special occasions.

name: chocolate Chip Cookies
ingredients: Baking soda, unsalted butter, granulated sugar, light brown sugar, pure vanilla extract, semisweet, milk chocolate chips
description: Classic Homemade Chocolate Chip Cookies are a timeless and cherished American treat. These cookies are adored for their soft and chewy texture, golden-brown edges, and a perfect balance of sweet, melty chocolate chips.

name: nan khatai
ingredients: all-purpose flour, ghee (clarified butter), sugar, cardamom powder, baking soda
description: Nan Khatai is a beloved Pakistani cookie known for its melt-in-the-mouth texture and delightful blend of aromatic spices. These eggless cookies are made with a combination of all-purpose flour, ghee, and sugar, along with a hint of cardamom powder for a unique and flavorful experience. Nan Khatai is a delightful accompaniment to tea and a cherished treat during festive occasions.

name: pasta carbonara
ingredients: Oz spaghetti, eggs, grated Pecorino Romano cheese, oz guanciale, cloves garlic, minced, fresh parsley, chopped (for garnish)
description: Pasta Carbonara is a classic Italian dish known for its rich and creamy sauce. It's made with simple ingredientss like eggs, cheese, and pancetta. This quick and delicious pasta is perfect for a weeknight dinner.

name: chicken tikka masala
ingredients: Boneless, skinless chicken breasts, yogurt, lemon juice, vegetable oil, cloves garlic, minced,  ginger paste, ground turmeric, ground cumin, paprika
description: Chicken Tikka Masala is a popular Indian dish with tender pieces of chicken in a creamy tomato-based sauce. It's rich, flavorful, and perfect when served with naan or rice.

name: gazpacho
ingredients: Ripe tomatoes, cucumber, red bell pepper, green bell pepper, red onion, cloves garlic, cup extra-virgin olive oil, red wine vinegar, black pepper, cumin, fresh basil leaves, chopped (for garnish)
description: Gazpacho is a refreshing Spanish cold soup made with fresh vegetables. It's perfect for hot summer days and is loaded with vitamins and flavor.

name: sushi Rolls
ingredients: Sushi rice, nori (seaweed) sheets, fresh fish, avocado, cucumber, soy sauce, wasabi, pickled ginger, Sesame seeds, bamboo sushi rolling mat
description: Sushi Rolls are a popular Japanese dish featuring vinegared rice, fresh fish, and vegetables rolled in nori sheets. Sushi is not only delicious but also an artful culinary experience.

name: vegan lentil
ingredients: Dried green lentils, garlic, minced, ginger, grated, diced tomatoes, coconut milk, red bell pepper, diced, zucchini, diced, carrots, sliced, curry powder, ground cumin, coriander, turmeric, paprika, cayenne pepper, cooked rice or naan.
description: This Vegan Lentil and Vegetable Curry is a flavorful and nutritious plant-based meal. It's made with hearty lentils and a variety of vegetables in a rich, aromatic curry sauce. It's perfect for those following a vegan diet and anyone looking for a satisfying and meat-free meal.

name: spaghetti bolognese
ingredients: Oz spaghetti, beef, minced, garlic, minced, carrot, stalk, crushed tomatoes, tomato paste, red wine, milk, dried oregano, dried basil, grated parmesan cheese (for garnish).
description: Spaghetti Bolognese is a classic Italian pasta dish with a rich and meaty tomato sauce. It's a hearty and satisfying meal that's loved around the world.

name: mango lassi
ingredients: Ripe mangoes, plain yogurt, milk, honey, cardamom powder, ice cubes
description: Mango Lassi is a sweet and creamy Indian drink made with ripe mangoes, yogurt, and a touch of cardamom. It's a perfect refresher, especially during hot summer days.

name: beef stroganoff
ingredients: Beef sirloin, thinly sliced, garlic, sliced mushrooms, butter, beef broth, flour, sour cream, dijon mustard, worcestershire sauce, fresh parsley, cooked egg noodles or rice.
description: Beef Stroganoff is a classic Russian dish with tender strips of beef in a creamy mushroom sauce. It's traditionally served over egg noodles or rice.
